item.title: ‘Gaza: How to Survive a Warzone’ Breached BBC’s Accuracy Guidelines by Not Disclosing That Narrator Was Son of Hamas Official, Review Finds
item.description: The BBC has acknowledged a significant editorial failing in its documentary “Gaza: How to Survive a Warzone” after an independent review found the broadcaster violated its own accuracy gui
